Text: Awesome, thank you very much (and no, I didn't even think to check out the MTCDC, complete mindderp on my part).  Thanks.
you're both welcome. this is a great old title. #17 is a favorite of mine, with huntress coming to earth-1 and meeting bats, robin, batgirl, for the first time -- and drawn by aparo!

Always loved these, especially when they did the reprints from the silver and golden age in them  Thanks so much!

STFmaryville, any chance you can upload the Neal Adams run on Batman and or Detective comics?  Those were so the best!

you're welcome malger and Mothra67.

Mothra67, i can do that -- i'd like to d/l that set for myself anyway. however at the moment i'm grabbing impact comics, faust and putting together more graphic novels.
